author: Warwick Barr
title: Eugenie Bouchard goes on date with fan John Goehrke Super Bowl bet - Yahoo7
text:
Share Eugenie Bouchard goes on date with fan John Goehrke Super Bowl bet - Yahoo7 Tennis star Eugenie Bouchard has followed through with her lost Super Bowl bet, enjoying a date with a Twitter follower at an NBA game. Close Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated UP NEXT VIDEO Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated. Source: Sports Illustrated Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated 
The Canadian star and now swimsuit model sat courtside at a Brooklyn Nets game on Thursday with a fan who asked her for a date on Twitter if the New England Patriots won the Super Bowl. Image: Twitter 
Bouchard tweeted during the Super Bowl that she knew the Falcons would win. I knew Atlanta would win btw â€” Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 6, 2017 
A fan named John Goehrke responded to her by writing "if patriots win we go on a date?" and she responded "Sure." @geniebouchard if patriots win we go on a date?
